definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Pen and brown -ink wash on vellum paper folded twice. 8x7 in.
sentences.chinese: 钢笔，棕色墨水，折叠两次的羊皮纸。

sentences.english: Finely chop the almonds and prepare a sheet pan with parchment.
sentences.chinese: 把杏仁剁碎，准备一个羊皮纸内衬平底锅。

sentences.english: Inkpots placed the parchments before Tyrion and handed him the quill.
sentences.chinese: 墨水瓶把羊皮纸铺在提利昂面前并递给他羽毛笔。

sentences.english: Duck has his sword, I my quill and parchment.
sentences.chinese: 鸭子有他的剑，我有羽毛笔和羊皮纸。

sentences.english: Is that a wooden box or an iron one?
sentences.chinese: 这张古老的羊皮纸是在一精致的铁盒子里发现的。

sentences.english: She handed the parchment to Ser Barristan, so he might read it for himself.
sentences.chinese: 她将羊皮纸递予巴利斯坦爵士，让他自己读。

sentences.english: This material was called ‘parchment’ and could be rolled up into a scroll.
sentences.chinese: 这种材料叫做“羊皮纸”，还可以卷成卷轴。

sentences.english: The writing on the parchments changed about halfway down the pile.
sentences.chinese: 在签到一半时羊皮纸上的内容开始变化。

sentences.english: The parchment crinkled crisply as he slid it toward the paymaster.
sentences.chinese: 当他把羊皮纸递给会计的时候它们清脆的折皱。

sentences.english: Will a parchment shield my people from the Yunkai'i?
sentences.chinese: 一卷羊皮纸就能让我的人民抵御渊凯人么？

sentences.english: Official documents are no longer written on lambskin.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经不用羊皮纸书写文案了。

sentences.english: Did you notice the beautiful parchments in my library?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到我书房里美丽的羊皮纸了吗？

sentences.english: This ancient parchment was discovered in a delicate iron box .
sentences.chinese: 这张古老的羊皮纸是在一精致的铁盒子里发现的。

sentences.english: The pile of parchments was formidably high.

definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper
bamboo writing slips in ancient times (joined together to form whole scrolls)
